metadata.title: CVE-2023-29406 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: The HTTP/1 client does not fully validate the contents of the Host header.A maliciously crafted Host header can inject additional headers or entirerequests. With fix, the HTTP/1 client now refuses to send requestscontaining an invalid Request.Host or Request.URL.Host value.

criterions.comment: golang: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
golang-1.6: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
golang-1.10 package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
